text: The 2002–03 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers men's basketball team represented Western Kentucky University during the 2002–03 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. The Hilltoppers were led by head coach Dennis Felton and All Sun Belt Conference forward, David Boyden.SBC 2016-17 Basketball Media Guide, retrieved 28 April 2020 They finished 1st in the SBC East Division and won the conference tournament and automatic bid to the 2003 NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament.Hilltoppers three-peat!, By the Daily News Online, Mar 12, 2003, retrieved 29 April 2020 Joining Boyden on the All SBC team was Mike Wells and Patrick Sparks, as well as SBC Freshman of the Year, Anthony Winchester. Boyden and Wells also made the SBC All-Tournament team and Sparks was tournament MVP.WKU Basketball Media Guide retrieved 21 April 2020 ==Schedule== 2002-03 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers Schedule and Results, Sports Reference, retrieved 29 April 2020 |- !colspan=6| Regular Season |- |- !colspan=6| 2003 Sun Belt Conference Men's Basketball Tournament |- !colspan=6| 2003 NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament ==References== Western Kentucky Category:Western Kentucky Hilltoppers basketball seasons Western Kentucky Western Kentucky Basketball, Men's Western Kentucky Basketball, Men's
title: 2002–03 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers basketball team
